name: American Wireless
tag_list: american-wireless, cell-phone-retailer, cell-phone-distributor, cell-phone-repair-service, bill-payment-processing, washington-dc, arlington, va, cricket-wireless, clearwire, clear-4g, simple-mobile, pageplus-cellular, h2o-wireless, brightpoint
overview:
American Wireless is a global services company providing solutions to Operators, Retailers, and Enterprises serving the telecommunications industry. Headquarted in Arlington, VA American Wireless is a progressive carrier agnostic company, with ability to provide service and solution from any carrier with any device through it’s unique propriatory right-fit technology.

Retail distribution is centered around the Washington DC Metro area specializing in distribution of no contract wireless products and services to consumers, businesses and government agencies. Value added services include unlocking service, smart phone repair service, flashing and programming to name a few.

Online operations makes up 80% of the revenue mix of American Wireless with distribution nationally of no contract wireless products/services, bill payment processing, activation / unlocking services and wireless consulting services.

Working with all no contract wireless carriers in the United States, American Wireless is able to provide the right product that fits the right customer need and able to execute within a short time frame generating value for organizations nationwide. Major partners of American Wireless include: Cricket Wireless, Clearwire, Simple Mobile, PagePlus Cellular, H2O Wireless, Brightpoint and First Data Processing.
